text: yahee khuda ka vaayada hai jo kabhee jhootha nahin hota phir jab hamaara (azaab ka) hukm aa pahuncha to hamane saaleh aur un logon ko jo usake saath eemaan lae the apanee meharabaanee se najaat dee aur us din kee rusavaee se bacha liya isamen shaq nahin ki tera paravaradigaar zabaradast gaalib hai
